title: BETMGM logo should only appear to users over 21
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is under 21
AND they launch the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the Games screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user should not see the BETMGM logo

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26576)

title: Carousel behavior for games being played
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user opens the app and makes picks in multiple games
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the top of the Games screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a carousel that will display all games that the user has made picks in
AND each game should display the current linescore of the game or time of start and timezone if the game has not started (test both)
AND each game should show the current inning, players on base, and the current number of outs
AND user should be able to smoothly navigate between games by swiping
AND correct logos and backgrounds should be displayed for both teams
AND clicking on an item in the carousel should take the player to that Contest for that item.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/26577)

title: Games List Pre-Game behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games tab and games are in a pre-game state
custom_expected:
THEN all games that have not started will display PRE-GAME above the team names
AND both team's logos will be displayed correctly
AND the time of the game and time zone will be displayed on the right
AND the game will be clickable and take to the pre-game card flow

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26578)

title: Games List Post-Game behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games tab and games have finished
custom_expected:
THEN "FINAL" should be displayed above the team names
AND the linescore with runs, hits, and errors should be displayed to the right
AND the team names and logos should be displayed correctly
AND the game should be clickable and take the user to the post-game flow

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26579)

title: Games List with Active Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games tab and games are active
custom_expected:
THEN the game should display the current inning above the team names
AND the team names and logos should be displayed correctly
AND the current score should be displayed to the right, along with the players on base, and the current number of outs
AND the game should be clickable and take you to the active game flow

![](index.php?/attachments/get/26580)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user opens the Games page and their device time is set to earlier than 8am ET
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN games from the previous day should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user opens the Games page and their device time is set to after 8am ET
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN games scheduled for today should be displayed

title: Time Zone / Time format
custom_steps:
1. Update the time zone - time of the game should be updated
2. Update the time format to the military - no am/pm should be displayed
custom_expected: Time of the games update when user changed the time zone and military time format

title: Games tab - no game day
custom_expected:
- No games are displayed. 
- 'No games to show' text is there

title: Current score for each game
custom_expected:
For each contest on the home screen, if user has a non-zero score for that contest, scores are shown inside of the row that describes that contest.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/29200)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/29201)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/29202)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/29203)
